metadata.title: Farmacy Rise 'N Shine Daily Moisture Lock
description: An innovative, lightweight day cream that locks in essential moisture.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "14.37 x 4.13 x 3.54 inches; 6.84 Ounces", "UPC": "852957006174"}

categorization.explanation: The product is a day cream which is used for face skin care. Therefore, it fits best under the 'Face' subcategory of 'Skin Care' in 'Beauty & Personal Care'.
